response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $15,000. To ensure we both achieve a fair transaction, I propose a special introductory offer of $14,000 for this product. This represents a significant discount while still allowing us to reach an agreement that respects the product's true worth. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this valuable exchange. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details.", "product_price": 14000}
